Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous, close to Assembly Hall”
Reviews.Author: msuhoops04
Reviews.Content: If you're coming to Champaign for a fun weekend of football or to see a basketball game, this hotel is perfect. It is within walking distance of campus and has a great atmosphere. Holihan's is attached so there is an awesome full service bar!! I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best service ever”
Reviews.Author: LifeTraveller07
Reviews.Content: This has to be one of the best service experiences in all the hotels I've ever stayed. Everyone was extremely accommodating and friendly. I travel a lot and found their hospitality to be unmatched. A bit too far to walk to the university but their van takes you anytime at no charge. And free airport pick up and drop off!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding place to stay in Champaign”
Reviews.Author: wallyflea
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night this past Tuesday for bball game and it was awesome. The service of the staff was outstanding and the place was really clean and decorated nicely. Really nice to have Houlihans connected to do dinner and breakfast the next morning. The location is great too as it's right on campus of IU. Nice place and will be staying there anytime we're in the area.

Reviews.Title: “My stay at the iHotel”
Reviews.Author: Ivy T
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay at this ihotel. It was one of the nicest hotels I had ever stayed in. The people at the front desk were very helpful and nice. I stayed there for about a week and took full advantage of the half off breakfast coupons they gave everyone I stayed with. The food in the restaurant that was on the first floor of the hotel was very good and the servers were very nice. There alcoholic drinks were very weak and a bit on the expensive side. The beds were very clean and comfortable. Room service did not come around at the crack of dawn.

Reviews.Title: “Best stay in champaign”
Reviews.Author: Dhjj4
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at quite a few of the local hotels. This one beats them all. Very clean and the attached houlihans is one of the best restaurants in town.. Staff was great. It snowed last night and all the cars in the lot had the snow brushed off.. WOW

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for the money”
Reviews.Author: smumbs
Reviews.Content: Whether you're on a business trip or a personal trip, you can't go wrong with this hotel. It's the major attributes (cleanliness, spaciousness, friendly staff) AND the little touches (free water and Internet) that make this such a great value for the money. It's right next to the basketball arena and Research Park area. It's also close to the nice boutique restaurants on Neil Ave.

Reviews.Title: “Don't miss the chance to Stay at the I”
Reviews.Author: Steve B
Reviews.Content: If you are traveling to Champaign, then don't miss the chance to stay at the I. Relax in the lobby "living room" with a hot Starbucks coffee and enjoy the original artwork. Say hello to Dwight or Sam and they will make sure your stay is 4 star at a 2 star price. We had a terrific weekend stay. The rooms are clean, contemporary and very comfortable. You will want to return home and remodel your bathroom just like the finishes you found in theirs. The lobby says contemporary Vegas and the staff treat you like grandma's house. If it's late night, try the special donut holes and a cocktail in the attached Houlihan's - then check out their breakfast the next morning. Our family was wowed by our recent stay and we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, contemporary hotel”
Reviews.Author: BestPlacesintheUSA
Reviews.Content: What a pleasant surprise! This wonderful hotel was right next to U of I's Assembly Hall. The large lobby has modern decor with a nice fireplace. There are several outdoor areas to sit and relax, too, but the wind from U of I's nearby farm was blowing the wrong way to enjoy the outdoors when we were there. Friendly staff. Fitness center is not only large, but each machine has its own tv - and they have headphones available. Only drawback was the Internet. The signal was too weak in our 4th floor room, so we had to access it in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel at U of I”
Reviews.Author: Veronica H
Reviews.Content: I always stay here when I go to an event at U of I. It is very clean and modern. The staff is very nice and welcoming.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Serene & Professional Staff”
Reviews.Author: Skye6049
Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel! Great art, very zen and an amazing staff! Sit outside in the courtyard and listen to the water fountain. It will soothe your weary spirit. Grab a coffee at the Starbucks in the hotel to recover and surf the internet in the lobby. There's a beautiful space to occupy in every direction. Hooligans, the restaurant attached, was the perfect antidote to my crazy diet restrictions. They kept me fed and happy! All without too much of a sting in the wallet. LOVE THIS PLACE!

Reviews.Title: “Loved my stay at this hotel - well designed, quiet and very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: dukiemac
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this hotel. It was simple in a good way, sleek and modern, light and very clean, and the furnishings reflected attention to comfort. Two queen beds in the room - no one does that - and the beds were amazing! Hands down the best hotel bed I have slept on. Better than my own in fact. There is a Houlihan's restaurant attached to the hotel property. I was very favorably impressed. Good selection, and what I had (asian chicken salad - deconstructed) was fresh and memorable. Really liked the outside courtyard (off the conference center that is also attached to the hotel) - private, quiet and serene. This place has a great vibe. I wish there were more hotels like this.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely a good hotel”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoMedicineMan
Reviews.Content: Just stayed here for a conference. It was as good as many other great hotels in big cities in terms of comfort, style, and service.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: dewalsh
Reviews.Content: We had heard good things about this hotel and decided to stay as a local weekend getaway. When we arrived, check-in was easy. Though it was 6 o'clock on a Friday evening, we were able to get a couples massage as well. Following the massage, we at at the on-site restaurant, Hoolihans. I had the best fish tacos ever! When we were in the room, we couldn't help but notice how clean it was. It was very plain, but it was affordable as well. I would recommend this hotel to people staying in Champaign.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Eyebolt
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were on our way back to Michigan after a wedding in Tennessee on what happened to be our anniversary. After checking out the options on Trip Advisor it basically looked to be a lot of your standard chain hotels, and then this place. The cost was pretty close, so I figured we'd try out the I. First, the decor is great...from the lobby to the room. The bed was comfy and the bathroom was probably the nicest I've had in a hotel at the price we paid ($100/nt for a king bed room). Overall, it was a pretty good nice stay. If I'm in Champaign for a night ever again, I would consider staying here again. A few notes: for breakfast you get vouchers for a free coffee and pastry at the on-site coffee shop. If you want something more, you can use the same voucher for 50% off at the restaurant...which was pretty good. After tip, it cost us another $14 for the two of us, so consider that if you're pricing things out with other hotels and genreally enjoy something more than a coffee and muffin for breakfast. Also, you can use the hotel's Roku box if you want an in-room movie...for a $15/day charge. A bit steep if you were just hoping to stay in for an evening and watch a movie considering it was likely basically a $60 investment on the hotel's side. Finally, along the lines of the television...when will hotels figure out how to have HD signals on their brand new HDTV's??? Nothing but analog standard def stretched out onto the nice LCD HDTV here. Annoying...but it seems to be standard at hotels these days.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional!”
Reviews.Author: Meggiepop
Reviews.Content: Fantastic service, super friendly staff. Exceptional facilities. Don't stay anywhere else in Champaign!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Champaign”
Reviews.Author: mileway
Reviews.Content: My husband & I spent three nights at the I Hotel. Our daughter is getting married out in Champaign in July and our guests will be staying at the hotel. We wanted to get a feel for the place. The hotel is right next to the University. The rooms are nice and roomy and clean. We used the small gym and found it to be just right for us. If you want a bigger gym, you can get a pass to use the University's athletic center. The hotel offers a free breakfast with each nite's stay. You can eat in the restaurant or grab a bite from the Starbucks within the hotel. Wi-fi is every where in the hotel which is great! We found the staff to be very attentive. Overall - we would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Champaign.

Reviews.Title: “Planning next visit to I Hotel”
Reviews.Author: bcdtortola
Reviews.Content: Stayed here during the Ebert Film Festival in 2010. Best hotel I've stayed in in Champaign and I've been coming to Champaign for 30 years. Finally a grown up hotel without a bunch of noisy students running around.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Champaign”
Reviews.Author: Chicago Flyer
Reviews.Content: By far, this is the best hotel in Champaign. I have stayed at many (due to my daughter attending U of I). I loved the modern feel from the lobby to the room. My king sized bed did not overwhelm the large room. Internet was free and a coffee/pastry included in the morning. Nice large bathroom with walk-in shower (no need to step into a bathtub to take a shower - yeah!). It is a 100% non-smoking hotel (another yeah!). The one problem is that the doors are not effective at keeping the hall noise out - it felt that people walking down the hall were in the room with me. Too bad. Also, too bad that the windows don't open to let a little fresh air in. Overall, would certainly stay here again. Ate dinner at the attached Houlihan's Restaurant and the food was good and reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay and Conference Hosting”
Reviews.Author: Hortkie
Reviews.Content: Our group has an annual mtg and the location is different each year (Univ's all over N. America) The rooms are awesome, beds comfortable, cool shower, nice adjacent bar/rest, nice conf. rooms, and great staff.

Reviews.Title: “wedding”
Reviews.Author: top144
Reviews.Content: We had our son's wedding and reception at the hotel. Everything was set up ready to go and the service was excellent. We had approx 100 guest and did not hear one complaint. I would recommend this hotel for any occation.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Champaign”
Reviews.Author: LAR712
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the i hotel and would definitely stay there again for business or pleasure. I had an excellent experience with the staff, who kindly replaced my forgotten toiletries! The location is perfect and the price is affordable. Both the sleeping and conference rooms were comfortable and had all the amenities you could ask for! Overall, it was a very pleasant experience!

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed all aspects of this hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: mollie91
Reviews.Content: What better place to have both meetings and being able to rest at night. Very accomodating hotel with excellent services. I would recommend this hotel to everyone!! If I was going to ILLINI SPORTING EVENTS, i WOULD STAY HERE EVERY TIME. I wish they would have the Crimestoppers state conference here every year.

Reviews.Title: “RUDE staff, lied to about late checkout!! DON'T stay here!”
Reviews.Author: travel22222
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was extremely rude, particularly the arrogant foreign dude who could barely speak english!! I was lied to about late checkout. Confirmed twice that 'Oh yes, late checkout is no problem.. 3:00 pm.' Even checked one week prior to my stay and was told, again, NO PROBLEM'. However when I checked in I was rudely told by the foreign dude that due to full occupancy there will be no late checkout. And that I WILL adhere to the 11:00 am checkout. I will never stay here again and I have already informed a LOT of people of my experience. All it takes is word of mouth people. Besides that, it isn't worth the $$$$$..

Reviews.Title: “Never again.”
Reviews.Author: Lisamarch
Reviews.Content: I'm very surprised by some of the reviews here. I have stayed here three times in the past year. Each time, same thing: wonderful when you get to the room (although just marginally clean) but terrible, horrible, customer service. First time: problem finding our reservation (we'd made 6 months prior) but finally found it. No apology. Then Houlihans restaurant was almost empty but took us over 2 hours to get lunch and pay for it. Second time I stayed, extremely rude front desk staff who would not tell us where to go for drinks, nor could they tell us best place to pick up the bus, and worse, when my spouse called at 10 pm, the main hotel number just rang and rang. Nobody answered! He tried 15 minutes later, same thing. This time, we made reservations 6 months prior, then two months ago I called to ask for late checkout. The person asked the manager and was given permission. We arrived and were told that regrettably they could not offer late checkout. We had to be out by 11 am. I asked why they could not have called or emailed me that. Was told, "we are booked tomorrow and have to clean rooms." No I'm sorry, not at all willing to negotiate. Our room was $189! Much, much higher than the Hilton Garden in down the road which is very nice too. I was told I could come down to the lobby later in the evening and "try to catch the manager." I said no, the manager could call me in my room. Of course the manager did not ever call. It seems the problem with the I Hotel is that they are not willing to work with a customer like a Hilton or Hyatt, or even a Super 8 is. They are always right, and never willing to look into something (like, where to get a bus). They say "I can't help you." This is NOT a way to get repeat business. Most of the front desk staff are university students and management either is not training them well, or they don't believe in offering staff flexibility. I'm done staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and professional staff”
Reviews.Author: NiigataTravelLover
Reviews.Content: I usually stay at this hotel in my business trip to Champaign. It is located a 5-min. walk to the company I often visit. The hotel provides a complimentary shuttle to and from the airport and nearby area so I do not have to rent a car. The hotel staff is very helpful and responsive to any request for transportations, restaurant recommendations and booking, and flight status check. I also used their conference rooms a couple of times and the conference staff is also very professional. They are always at our service before and during the conference and make sure all the equipments are in good shape and effective. This hotel has a popular restaurant and bar and I really like having beer and wine in early evening after work for refreshment. Overall I feel so lucky to find this hotel and will be a regular customer for long.

Reviews.Title: “Impeccably clean, fantastic and friendly service”
Reviews.Author: ClovisChicago
Reviews.Content: I rely on the tripadvisor community. I heard about this hotel through tripadvisor. I now book all of my hotels AFTER reading the reviews from the community. I take your reviews very seriously, and I will likewise try to share useful information for you. LOCATION Excellent. It is actually on the campus of the University of Illinois, which made it very convenient for me because I was attending a class (on Saturday) at the school. SHUTTLE SERVICE The hotel also provides a FREE shuttle service, which I really appreciated. The service actually picked me up at the train station, drove me to class (offered to pick me up if I called the hotel), and dropped me off at the train station - all completely free. I really appreciated this service because I arrived very late and did not know the area well, and the driver took me right where I needed to go. Thank you for that. SERVICE Great service. Everyone at the hotel was extremely friendly and professional and really enhanced the pleasantness of my stay. Brief funny story: on the train I was doing some work and used a highlighter. It exploded in my pant pocket. The hotel washed my pants (and shorts) for me. I was also grateful that the hotel allowed me to keep my luggage with them at the front desk while I attended my class the next day. The staff maintains a positive can-do attitude and goes out of its way to please. The hotel provides free parking, but I ended up taking a train from Chicago. ROOM Very comfortable, large beds and a huge tv in your room. The room is modern looking and very comfortable. Great, large showers (excellent water pressure). More than enough towels, which I liked. The comfortable robe worked well for me, considering I had to have my clothes cleaned that I arrived in because of my highlighter explosion. Room also has a large desk in it to get work done. Very roomy. Comfortable chairs. Also books in room for reading. RESTAURANT I had breakfast and dinner. The restaurant is conveniently attached to the hotel, simply walk to your left from the front desk. I had a great experience. When I arrived I had dinner, which was very good. The salad was great. The bar has excellent beer on tap (e.g., Bell's Brown Ale). The people at the restaurant are also very friendly. I had a large breakfast the next morning. The hotel provides a free yogurt and coffee (I took my Starbucks coffee to go). I had a full breakfast, which was excellent. Overall, it was an excellent experience. I have no complaints at all. It was a very comfortable, pleasant, and convenient stay for me. I do recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “nice place, though could be cleaner”
Reviews.Author: travelreluctant
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one night only. The first room had a noisy refrigerator, but they moved us to another, quiet room as soon as we called them. The room was reasonably clean (not immaculate though -- we found crumbs under a bed and a half-empty vaseline bottle by the window). What is a really nice touch is that there are six or seven books waiting for the guests in every room -- some quite readable, and none of them the bible. Also, they do not rip off gusts on bottled water -- there is a fridge full of free water on the ground floor. Free coffee and muffin in the morning is not a bad touch either. Overall, if you have to be in Champaign, this is a good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Too bad for Champaign”
Reviews.Author: bretrobert
Reviews.Content: The I Hotel & Conference Center just doesn't meet the standards it promises on the net. We arrived at the relatively new hotel on December 26th to be greeted by an impersonal employee of the hotel. It was late and we wanted to head for bed. When I pulled back the duvet cover I soon realized that it hadn't been changed in a while: long hair on it and dried mucous on the edge. Ick. The evening room service showed up and asked me to show him the dirty piece. After pulling both the duvet and duvet cover off of the bed, he replaced it with a duvet cover only. I asked him about returning the duvet, too. He didn't seem to understand that part. He also didn't know how to put a duvet cover on a duvet. I did it for him. He left and we went to bed. In the quiet of the late evening we learned that the ventilation system in the bathroom was tuned to run all night. Being a practical guy, I closed the door. I had hoped to find a cool hotel in Champaign. Too bad that the I Hotel misses the mark.

Reviews.Title: “University of Illinois Eval”
Reviews.Author: BobTwain
Reviews.Content: Wow! What a nice hotel. You know every once in a while you get a great deal on a hotel that is brand new - the value is so high. Well this is it! And yes, I give every aspect of this hotel 5 dots. Rooms are quiet - even heat/air is whisper quiet. Staff was super good - couldn't say enough about them Free shuttle rides to and from campus 24/7 $99, yes no typo here - ask for the U of I rate - room is worth 2x this price The attached Houlihan's is very nice Flat screen TV Very comfortable beds High end bathrooms (e.g. granite, faucets) I can't say enough about this property. I highly recommend it and if my daughter ends up going to U of I, here I will stay here every time.

Reviews.Title: “Top notch”
Reviews.Author: Phoenixreviewer
Reviews.Content: I stayed here only 1 night, but it was wonderful. I had room 432 which had a view of the Qual com building and front of hotel parking lot. The Hilton Garden and Homewood Suites were in the distance. This is a great hotel and walking distance to the Assembly Hall. The room had a king bed,leather desk chair,club chair and ottoman,flat screen LG TV with sleep timer which I love. The room and hotel are a very modern decor. The room comes equipped with an i home/clock radio which is very difficult to see the actual time on the clock. There are 2 robes in the closet as well as an in-room safe that accomodates a laptop. There is an iron and ironing board in the closet. There is a small refrigerator under the TV cabinet. There is complimentary high speed internet and WiFi in the room. I had no problem using the internet. There is RUSK brand bath products that are very nice. There is a shower but no tub. A hair dryer is in the bath room. The hotel is 100% smoke free. Houlihans Restaurant is connected to the hotel and I ate there for dinner 1 night. It was good,service ok. I received a coupon at check in for Starbucks for a coffee/beverage and or yogurt or pastry. This is located off the lobby on the way to Houlihans. Very nice and complimentary. If the price is right I would stay here again without hesitation. Parking is complimentary in the lot. Very quiet hotel and great staff.

Reviews.Title: “Beuty and comfort on the University of Illinois campus”
Reviews.Author: homebodyDexter_Mi
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the I Hotel was brief but wonderful. The rooms are quiet, the beds are very comfortable, and the decor is modern and elegant. There is much beautiful woodwork throughout. The staff members went out of their way to be helpful and informative. The landscaping is lovely. They provide a free shuttle service to anywhere on the University of Illinois campus and a room rate discount for those of us on a college visit. I highly recommend this hotel and we certainly plan to stay there again on future visits to the area.

Reviews.Title: “I'd wouldn't stay there again”
Reviews.Author: libmank
Reviews.Content: I had a negative experience here. I was staying with my elderly father, and there were no non-slip strips in the bathtub, nor mats. Long story short, he fell (fortunately he was ok), and so I asked for a change of room to a walk in shower. Frankly, after he fell, they should have comped us the room. We could totally sue for negligence. At any rate, the new room had a funny smell and an odd hum, which was later identified as the air conditioner of the conference center. Nothing they could do. They had no other room to change us to, and actually offered to give us a "discount" on another room! Further, the handicapped room had no place to hang clothes that were knee length (as if disabled people do not either travel with able bodied people). When I finally expressed my dismay, they gave me a discount to the hotel restaurant! (I don't live in Champaign--when am I going to use this?). The hotel staff was disingenuously nice. Yuck! I'm staying at the Hilton the next time.

Reviews.Title: “If you want to be surrounded by luxury, comfort, & customer service this is the place to be.”
Reviews.Author: libbyChicago
Reviews.Content: As soon as you walk in you know you're in a special place. The lobby's pizzazz makes it a place where you want to visit, sit and chat, or read. The staff is courteous and takes time to explain things and answer your questions. The rooms are comfortable and roomy and I loved opening the drapes to enjoy the view and sunset. I like its proximity to campus and being able to walk to university functions.

Reviews.Title: “First class service and accommodations at I Hotel”
Reviews.Author: CathyManning_Iowa
Reviews.Content: Everything thing was top notch during our 2 night stay. Service was top priority there. Room was very spacious for 4 of us. Free bottled water by the exercise room was a nice plus. We got coupons for a drink and breakfast item which was delicous. I would highly recommend this hotel to everyone. Nice outside courtyard to enjoy a drink also.

Reviews.Title: “Contemporary place with phenomenal service”
Reviews.Author: agargi
Reviews.Content: I had my wedding ceremony and celebrations at iHotel, and had booked my suite at same place. Everything there was perfect - from food to decoration and individual event organization. I still say to people that I had a dream wedding at iHotel. Staff there was especially very helpful and accommodating. Having a great bar and restaurant within the premises made our after-party even more fun. Food and drinks there were awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the BEST place to stay in Champaign”
Reviews.Author: lynnls
Reviews.Content: The brand new I Hotel & Conference Center is a step above other hotels in the Champaign/Urbana area. Great location, nice rooms, very clean, and five-star service -- A+ for the total package! Rates are equal to or less than other not-as-nice hotels in the area. The attached Houlihan's restaurant is also terrific for food and service. I highly recommend the I!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: uofigirl411
Reviews.Content: I had a great experience staying at the I Hotel. The staff was very friendly and willing to do anything to make our stay perfect. The hotel is very modern looking. The lobby is big and clean. The guest rooms have the most comfortable beds and pillows. Each room has 2 very comfortable robes in the closets which was a very nice touch. I had a massage arranged in the hotel and it was great! I recommend using their spa service. One day I used the breakfast vouchers to get a yogurt and drink from the i cafe and the next day I took advantage of the $6 Houlihan's breakfast coupons. The food was excellent! I also really liked the free high speed internet! The overall experience was excellent and I will never stay anywhere else when I am in Champaign! Thank you so much I Hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, attentive staff”
Reviews.Author: panda1323
Reviews.Content: The hotel would get five stars across the board had it not been for the LONG delay in getting our food at Houlihan's for breakfast. They seemed alittle overwhelmed by the crowd and the staff did the best that they could. Other than that small incident, the stay at the hotel could not have been better. It is beautifully designed both in the guest rooms and the common areas. The hotel staff was very friendly and efficient. The price of the room also made it a very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for a great experience.”
Reviews.Author: IsaacCedarFalls
Reviews.Content: It was a pleasure to stay at the I hotel and confernece center. All aspects of the visit were exemplary. The room was clean and the furnishings looked as if they were new. The conference center was convenient, the media set up was excellent, the the meals were well prepared. It was nice to be near campus which made evening walks safe and convientent.

Reviews.Title: “Service is Exceptional”
Reviews.Author: day1995
Reviews.Content: My husband and I didn't actually get to stay at the iHotel b/c they inadvertently overbooked and couldn't honor our reservation : ( We were bumped to another area hotel, but, I just HAVE to tell you about the Director of Sales - Megan. She personally called me, at home the day before our scheduled arrival, to explain and was very sincere and appologetic. Additionally, when we checked in to the alternate hotel(which Megan arranged completely), there was a handwritten note from Megan D. and a gift certificate for Houlihan's restaurant and also one for their in-house spa! In the service industry, that is what's called going over and above - something I strive for as a service employee myself and also something I appreciate thoroughly as a recipient. Great job Megan - we will definately make our reservation at the iHotel when we are in town next!

Reviews.Title: “Glad we stayed at the I”
Reviews.Author: CV724
Reviews.Content: The I Hotel and Conference Center is a new facility within walking distance of Assembly Hall (NKOTB rocked the house!!). The hotel and our room were both very clean, the staff were friendly, and we liked being away from the center of campus. They gave us breakfast vouchers, for both days of our stay, that were good for either a free beverage and pastry from their cafe or you could order a breakfast entree for $6 at Houlihan's, which is attached to the hotel. This was a pleasant surprise as breakfast was not included when we booked. Hopefully this is a permanent breakfast option. No complaints--we will definitely stay there in the future. As a side note, we made the short trip to Sunsinger Wine Bar (also a wine store) for glass of wine. They have a great selection of wines and also a nice menu of sandwiches, small plates, and desserts. And the atmosphere was very laid-back.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed excellent food and service.”
Reviews.Author: GraciousLady_9
Reviews.Content: I chose to host a bridal shower and luncheon at the I Hotel and Conference Center because the bride and many of her friends live in Champaign, IL. The guests at the shower agreed that the food was delicious, the staff was friendly and the setting was beautiful. I've never been more pleased with the food and service at any other hotel. In fact, I can't think of one single suggestion for improvement. Everything was outstanding! Mary G. from Decatur, IL

Reviews.Title: “What gracious hospitality”
Reviews.Author: patluck
Reviews.Content: My son and I spent two nights at the I Hotel and Conference Center which is located adjacent to the University of Illinois in Champaign. We found the staff to be friendly and very helpful yet unobtrusive, the hotel and rooms spotless and comfortable, and the location next to the university very convenient. Wireless internet was free, and when I asked to use a printer to I was given access to a computer in a peaceful and secure room. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Classic elegance”
Reviews.Author: waynesilv
Reviews.Content: I really loved the hotel. It was centrally located to where my daughter was living and to the other events that I attended. There was a paper everyday at the front desk. The lobby was clean and modern. The rooms were great. The two cushy bathrobes in the closet were fantastic. You can also buy them if you like. It had a flat screen TV and my room had two queen beds that were very comfortable. You didn't have a shortage of pillows, as there were many on the bed and plenty extra in the closet. The bathroom was beautiful and very well appointed. Also, the hotel was quiet and always very clean. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: chirish89
Reviews.Content: This hotel was lovely. It is new (opened last year), the beds are comfortable and the rooms clean. It is right beside Assembly Hall for those visiting the University of Illinois. There is a Houlihan's restaurant on site serving food and drink. There is also room service if needed. You'll have to drive if you are going into town though. (only 5-10 minutes) Staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “The little touches make this a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: WeTravel
Reviews.Content: We were in town to visit family and chose this hotel both for location and out of curiosity to see what it looked like. It was what you would expect of a new business hotel, a contemporary lobby and large spotless rooms. It was what we didn't expect that made this a hotel we'll return to. Many hotels have a comfortable chair in the room for you to relax and read, but this chair had a blanket over the back, a welcome feature with snow outside. Forgot a book? Two bookshelves in the room provided a mini-library to choose from. We walked through the conference center and saw a nice variety of meeting rooms. Coupled with the restaurant on site, plus Starbucks, this hotel makes a good spot for business. Across the street from Assembly Hall, and walking distance to the Research Park and Memorial Stadium.

HotelInfo.Name: I Hotel & Conference Center
HotelInfo.Address: 1900 S First St, Champaign, IL 61820-6914
